knimeNode.name: To JSON
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a FoodChain-Lab network to the JSON format of the FoodChain-Lab Web App.

fullDescription.intro: Converts a FoodChain-Lab network to the JSON format of the FoodChain-Lab Web App.

ports.inPort: Table with Station data. Is provided by first out port of Supply Chain Reader.
Table with Delivery data. Is provided by second out port of Supply Chain Reader.
Table with Delivery Relations data. Is provided by third out port of Supply Chain Reader.
Table with json column that contains the Tracing View Settings in JSON format.
ports.outPort: JSON format of FoodChain-Lab Web App.
